title: Kebabcase String
description: In this lab, we will explore how to convert a given string into kebab case using JavaScript. Kebab case is a common naming convention in programming where words in a string are separated by hyphens. We will use regular expressions and array methods to split the string into words and then combine them using the kebab case format.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
